Package core

Class Transition

java.lang.Object
core.PetrinetElement
core.Transition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Transition>
public class Transition extends PetrinetElement
Class representing transitions in petri nets. Every transition has a set of places (see Place) serve as input (preset) and a set of places (see Place) that serve as output (postset). Transitions may be activated, if they are active, meaning every place that serves as an input has a token. See also Petrinet.
